about_the_game:
Try to survive the maximum number of days on an island infested with zombies. Collect resources to stay alive, water, food. Look for firearms or melee weapons to defend yourself against zombies. If you feel tired, look for a bed to rest.

Coolers will hold only beverages, fridge will hold beverages and food. In the furniture you can find weapons, ammunition and medicines. Some zombies can give you infections, scratch you or even bite you, find and use medicines and bandages for this type of damage. Running too much will leave you thirsty, try to stay hydrated. When entering the houses you may encounter unfriendly guests, be careful. During the night vision will be limited and the zombies will be faster.

Be careful to have enough resources at night, as it will be more difficult to find them.

Each weapon has a different reload time and range.

Don't let the zombies see you or they will try to kill you, run away or destroy them.

Some zombies will try to find you even if they haven't seen you, keep moving.

Choose the amount of loot, duration of the night, speed of the zombies.

short_description: Enter an island infested with zombies and try to survive. Search and collect weapons to stay alive. Move stealthily to avoid being detected and take care of your resources. Handle melee or firearms weapons to clear areas and be able to sleep peacefully
